name: Solitarot: Tarot Solitaire
description:
Use the classic Rider-Waite tarot deck to deal through a newly designed solitaire game.

Instead of serious fortunes, receive 'unfortunes' given to you to tell your future through the cards. These fortunes are just for fun though, don't go make this awkward by being too intense now.

Rules:

Place cards lowest first into Discard Pile. Cards placed on top of each other can only be of higher value or a wild card. Use a wild card to clear Discard Pile. If you cannot place a card, remove the Discard Pile and have 1 strike go against you. If you hit three strikes, you lose. If you discard all three Deck Piles, you win!

Card values are started with the smallest, Ace to 10, Page, Knight, Queen, King. The Major Arcana is wild and will clear any cards in the Discard Pile.

Clear at least 3 Major Arcana cards to receive a fortune.
